episode_summary: In this episode, Dan Rochon shares insights on building a consistently profitable real estate business by mastering communication and connection. He introduces the Teach to Sell system, emphasizing the importance of setting client expectations and focusing on one strategy at a time to avoid overwhelm. Dan's approach is particularly valuable for agents looking to enhance their client management skills and navigate diverse client backgrounds.
